description: A triangle of coefficients of A053122 type binomials {x,y},{y,z} and {z,x}, made using A_n Cartan type matrix characteristic polynomials: an(x,n) = CharacteristicPolynomial(M(A_n,n)); f(x,y,n) = Sum[Coefficients(an[x,n)*x^i*y^(n-i),{i,0,n}]; p(x,y,z,n) = f(x,y,n) + f(y,z,n) + f(z,x,n).
